eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 08:43 PM ON NOV 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:26 AM NOV 16, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Phoenix Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police Department is looking for 83 year old white female, Angela Latonis, last seen on foot wearing a lavender sweater with purple flowers, purple undershirt, blue jeans and lavender shoes, in the area of 43rd Ave and Cactus Road. Angela is five feet one inch tall and weighs 125 pounds with white hair and hazel eyes. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
